markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 3+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Olfactory Obfuscator](/Equipment.aspx?ID=690)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=59" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 254 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Interact</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This frothing fluid causes the drinker's body to exude trace odor-absorbing oils. For the listed duration after drinking this elixir, your scent is nearly unnoticeable. Creatures with imprecise scent don't detect you with that sense unless they [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=84) for you, and you are [concealed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=4) from creatures that perceive you with precise scent. You gain a +4 item bonus against attempts to Seek you by creatures using only scent-based senses; if they use any other senses as well, the bonus doesn't apply.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs="Standard"
>
Olfactory Obfuscator
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 254 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 9 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The duration is 10 minutes.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Olfactory Obfuscator (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 254 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Price** 225 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The duration is 8 hours.
name: Olfactory Obfuscator
